: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw: I see your delima, and I believe I have a solution to the problem.
SharpClaw sends a right hook at KitKat's jaw. He wants to knock her out. SharpClaw doesn't understand why, but he feels that he should keep this bot safe.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She looked at him and transformed to bot mode. "I suppose your right. 
But I can not back down now. Not without Hyrdas recalling me. It 
would not be honorable."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> He looked down on her wolf mode.
> SharpClaw: Is it work killing yourself for at this time? You have 
just recently come abck online, and we need troops. Between the 
Tripredacus, the Maximals, and the other odd factions, we need all we 
can get in the long term.
>  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:KitKat::
> 
> She sighed and looked down, is in wolf mode."I had a hunch. But in 
> case they don't, I must try."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : SharpClaw : :
> > The male sighs, looking down.
> > SharpClaw: I'm sure they will have a vaccine by now. Rodimus and 
> his men are not stupid, we underestimate them. Especially in the 
> science and research; after all they specialize in that rather then 
> combat. I believe that you will die in vain, not with honor like a 
> Predacon warrior should...
> 
> 
>
